title: Jackson: Book 2 of a 3 book arc (Reed Security 14)
features: This is the 14th book in the Reed Security Series and the 2nd book of a 3 book arc. The arc books need to be read in order and it is suggested that the rest of the series is read in order as well.

She's beautiful and so damn feisty. I don't know how she ended up with a$$hole she was with, but I'm here now and I'm going to help her. I can't have her though. She's damaged. She hides behind a tough exterior, but deep down, she needs some serious help. Help that I don't know how to give. And now she's wrapped up in this mess with Reed Security and we're on the run together. I knew she would be tempting. I knew I couldn't just walk away. Damsels in distress are my thing. I want her so much, but not until she deals with her past. Only then will I make her mine.

Ugh, I hate men that think they need to save you. Jackson is like that. He thinks I need someone to coddle me and talk things through with me. But what I really need is a man to take me and make me his. In a positive way, of course. I've done the other way and it wasn't fun. But I'm not a wallflower. I know that bad shit happens. I also know that I just need to move on. I've never been one to dwell on the past, but Jackson doesn't want to hear that. He wants me to heal. I wish he would listen to me when I tell him I just need some sexual healing.
description: "Giulia Lagomarsino swept in from seemingly nowhere and blindsided me with the way she mixes romance and danger and mystery and family all into one big disaster that has to be sorted out." -Brittany's Book Blog"Holy cow I so love these guys." -Little Shop of Readers"Giulia wrote another amazing book, with everything we love about Reed Security. She hooks you from start to finish and then leaves you needing more. I don't think I'll ever get tired of these books." -The Art of Reading"This is a fantastic story which is intense, intriguing, emotional, hilarious, and with mystery, suspense and danger along the way." -Wendy's Book Blog"I want to say Thank You to the author for not causing another panic attack! She likes to play with our emotions and I really think she enjoys killing our favorite characters. But do the hot guys ever really die?" -Cassie's Book Addicts"I absolutely love this entire series and Jackson is no different!! As always the book has an incredible storyline full of amazing characters!! I was hooked from beginning right till the end!!" -AngelBabe's Blog"While Jackson didn't answer many questions which upset me a great deal Giulia Lagomarsino, it is the 2nd book of a 3 book arc like it says in the title, so YOU MUST READ Sniper FIRST! Anyway, I'm dying more inside now, though I did love Jackson's story a ton!Â Now, I NEED that last book of this 3 part in the worst way before I lose it completely, and will end with HIGHLY HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO ALL!" -The Power of Three Readers"Oh my God!!! If this wasn't a nailbiter turned tear fest, turned hot zone, turned nailbiter I don't know what was. This book was gripping, hot, painful, stressful and full of the banter that these guys can only deliver!" -Cajun Heat Book Blog"Ms. Lagomarsino was a new author to me a few books ago, but will not be a stranger, and I cannot wait for the other Reed Security men to make it to the top of my TBR list!" -Lindaluvsbooks"This book was action packed from the get-go and full of twists and turns I never saw coming." -A Book Nerd, a Bookseller, and a Bibliophile"Full of emotion, action and suspense the twists keep coming which leaves us wanting the next book to see how it all ends." -Kari's Book Reviews and Revelations"This book will hook you from the beginning and hold you until the end. I can't wait for what comes next." -Moonlight Novels

Giulia Lagomarsino is an author and stay at home mom of three, living in St. Paul, Minnesota. In her free time she enjoys, ....wait, she has three kids. When her kids are sleeping, she writes, and reads. She loves to spend time with family. Giulia's first series of books,
For the Love of a Good Woman, debuted in 2017. Her next series, titled
, will have some overlap with the first series, but will focus on the characters at Sebastian's security firm.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/q3j9mgqubugtgov7c5d0ma7v5m._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Giulia Lagomarsino', 'about': ['I\'m a stay at home mom that loves to read. Some of my favorite titles are Pride and Prejudice, Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings, and Horatio Hornblower. I started writing when I was trying to come up with suggestions on ways I could help bring in some extra money. I came up with the idea that I could donate plasma because you could earn an extra $500/month. My husband responded with, "No. Find something else. Write a blog. Write a book." I didn\'t think I had anything to share on blog that a thousand other mothers hadn\'t already thought of. I decided to take his challenge seriously and sat down to write my first book, Jack. I was surprised at how much I enjoyed writing. From there, the stories continued to flow and I haven\'t been able to stop. I hope my readers enjoy my books as much as I enjoy writing them. Between reading, writing, and taking care of three small kids, my days are quite full.']}
